text: Born Yesterday is a 1950 American comedy movie directed by George Cukor and based on the 1946 play of the same name by Garson Kanin. It stars Judy Holliday, Broderick Crawford, William Holden, Howard St. John and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. It was nominated for 5 Oscars and won an Academy Award in 1951 and was remade in 1993. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1950 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies directed by George Cukor Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies set in Washington, D.C. Category:Columbia Pictures movies
title: Born Yesterday
